snippet.title: The House of The dead 3 FULL GAME PLAYTHROUGH
snippet.description:
Full playthrough of The House of The Dead 3. Took at least 30 minutes to complete and even though I get an S rank I still get a bad ending.
I don't how endings are triggered to be honest. Once I had S ranks on all chapters and got a SS overall rank but still get a bad end. Following the same paths on time attack gives me the best end. I don't get this at all.

Edit: Cheers for the answers on my question, different paths take you to different endings.


http://www.vizzed.com/games/the-house-of-the-dead-iii-pc-windows-83827-

Chapters:
Chapter 0: Reminiscence: 0:00
Chapter 1: Chasing Shadows: 2:36
Chapter 2: Bewilderment: 7:35
Chapter 3: Sensory Chaos: 14:29
Chapter 4: Ultimate Challenge: 20:45
Chapter 5: Wheel of Fate: 27:08
End: 37:17
